How to get started using SDL_Config

This file should give you a good overview on how to get started using SDL_Config.  It strives to make the learning curve as shortest as possible.
First, I recommend to read the online documentation
  • Introduction: http://student.agh.edu.pl/~koshmaar/SDL_Config/readarticle.php?article _id=1
  • How to setup compiler: http://student.agh.edu.pl/~koshmaar/SDL_Config/readarticle.php?article_id=3
  • Simple example programs: http://student.agh.edu.pl/~koshmaar/SDL_Config/readarticle.php?article_id=5
Then you might want to read Example to get basic idea and give a glance at Syntax for in-depth discussion of .cfg file syntax.
Main library documentation which you will be using often is in SDL_config_lib.h on the right.
There’s a great number of tests in tests\ directory that show how to use SDL_Config.
Thanks for using my lib!
        Koshmaar (kosh.nosp@m.maar@poczta..nosp@m.onet.pl)
